word_mean: 木馏油，杂酚油：主要为山毛榉科(Faga ceae)欧洲山毛榉(Fagus sylvati ca)的木焦油经蒸馏而得之酚类混合物，为无色至黄色油质液体，折光性极强，有焦臭味。外用作防腐剂，内服作慢性支气管炎之祛痰剂

sentence.Network_en: We first treated the wood with creosote.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们先用杂酚油对木柴进行加工.

sentence.Network_en: Shingles are often dipped in creosote.
It has also been used to fortify the fungicidal action of creosote.
sentence.Network_cn: 它也用来起强化防腐油的杀菌作用.

石炭酸灌木（Creosote Bush），是一种有着浓重气味的常绿灌木，生长在美国西南部、墨西哥北部和南美洲。人们曾经发现过生长了…

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: coined in German from Greek kreas 'flesh' + sōtēr 'preserver', with reference to its antiseptic properties

entry.tran: 杂酚油，木馏油(用于木材防腐)
entry.def: Creosote is a thick dark liquid made from coal tar which is used to prevent wood from rotting.

means.word_mean: 1. a colorless or yellowish oily liquid obtained by distillation of wood tar; used as an antiseptic
2. a dark oily liquid obtained by distillation of coal tar; used as a preservative for wood
